thread.title: Rich Cains

author: Rich Cains
title: Rich Cains
text: HablaCuba has helped in making phone calls to our family in Cuba. It's a shame the US tries to resolve political issues halfway around the world and cannot seem to help make our relationship "right" for a country just 90 miles away. China is the largest Communist nation that has ever existed and yet, we have no problem sending our jobs to them and buying their products. HablaCuba has helped link families together and I am grateful for that.
